name: Last wish
description:
"The Last Wish" is a visual novel about a girl who got involved in a deadly game. To stop the murders, she needs to make the right wishes.



In a small town, the usual autumn bustle, the older generation tinkering with vegetable gardens, young people studying and having fun in an attempt to keep the summer.




Student Kris does not want to be ordinary. She is an individual. She works as a webcam model to spite her mother and public opinion. She dropped out of university against her father's will. Everyone is sure that her boyfriend uses her - she doesn't care, the main thing is that she is comfortable with him.

And only her best friend Maya sees that life as a protest makes Kris unhappy. She needs to change something. The universe has heard the request. Now all the wishes of the girl expressed on the Web come true, but with extreme cruelty. Only one thing will help save loved ones and punish evil - the last wish.




"Last Wish" is an interactive story where the player, by his choice, helps the heroine to get out of a criminal story, find love and make peace with her family.

The peculiarity of the gameplay is that the player's choice is made through making wishes for Kris. How the game ends and how the heroine behaves, her character and reaction to events depend on what the player chooses.

And active objects in the environment help to immerse yourself in the story of the heroine, learn about her thoughts and experiences. In the smartphone, you can view photos of Kris in social networks, read the correspondence in the messenger and better understand what is happening.




KRIS

19 years old. Student and webcam model. Her studies at uni are derailed, her relationship with her parents has broken down, and her boyfriend does not appreciate her at all. Kris seems cold and cynical, but is it really so?

NIK

20 years. Kris' boyfriend. A novice YouTuber. He is dependent on the opinions of others, chasing money and fame. He is not satisfied with what he has, and believes that he deserves more. What is Nick willing to do to get noticed?

MAYA

19 years old. A student, a friend of Kris. An easy-going, sociable girl with a sense of humor. Despite the fact that Maya is in good standing almost everywhere, she can keep Kris company at any, even the craziest party. But sometimes things don't go smoothly between friends. Will Maya be able to maintain her friendship with Kris this time, and at what cost?
